channel.title: Homes on Aditya Chandupatla
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Aditya Chandupatla

item.description: Biography A highly driven individual with a demonstrated history of working in a couple of MNC’s as a Software Engineer. I bring academic expertise coupled with Industry best-practises to the table. My research interests include natural language processing, computer vision and robotics. At Teradata, I have worked on diverse set of projects including but not limited to: Integration of Tensorflow to run analytical queries within database, and accelerating aggregation queries using GPU.

item.title: Quora
item.description: On Quora, by and large, I write about Computer Science, Data Science, AI/ML, Jobs & careers, Education, Technology, Life and Marvel movies. What are some things about coding that you learned from good programmers around you? How does logistic regression work (step by step)? In linear regression, how is the learning rate defined? Is it calculated or predicted? As a software engineer, what is the most alarming thing you have ever seen in a codebase?

item.title: Medium Articles
item.description: I have recently started writing on Medium in order to share my technical knowledge to the world. Technologies with which I’ll be associated are: Deeplearning, Computer Vision, NLP, Java, C/C++, Python & R. Here are my published articles: Introduction to Linear Regression Classification for Beginners Neural Networks Clustering: Unsupervised Machine Learning Principal Component Analysis Don’t want to miss out? Start Following
